description: This is a self-directed, portfolio-based module that encourages students to document, reflect upon, and evaluate their artistic practices within their chosen fields. Students will produce traceable output from projects that can take a variety of formats, such as ensemble collaborations, pedagogy-facing outreach projects, and multimedia creation. Students are also required to present their reflections at the end of the semester to detail learning processes and outcomes.
title: Musical Explorations
prerequisite: This module is restricted to students enrolled in the Master of Music Leadership degree programme.
